api_list.name: GET_Hello_Get
GET_Vats_List
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://altoviz.p.rapidapi.com/v1/Vats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "altoviz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
